title: Universo Vegano
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Italian, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Franchise vegan fast food outlet with locations in Italy. Counter service. Offers burgers, sandwiches, salads, and other vegan foods. Located near the flea market. Opened Spring 2015.
streetAddress: Via Pietrapiana 53 Rosso, Angolo Piazza dei Ciompi
